Obtains information about this time zone at the time point {{c|tp}}.

===Return value===
@1@ A {{lc|std::chrono::sys_info}} structure {{tt|i}} containing the time zone information in effect for this time zone at the time point {{c|tp}}. {{c|tp}} will be in the range {{range|i.begin|i.end}}.
@2@ A {{lc|std::chrono::local_info}} structure containing information about the local time {{c|tp}} in this time zone.
